description: Try our easy to follow Crayfish Cocktail recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fish dishes,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Crayfish Cocktail Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 small ripe avocado, stoned, peeled and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Mix together the mayonnaise and ketchup, add Tabasco and lemon juice to taste and season. Stir through the crayfish.
Pile the lettuce leaves into serving bowls and top with the avocado. Spoon over the crayfish mixture. Sprinkle with some paprika to garnish.
